description: '''Alaskan hip-hop''' is a resurgent subgenre of [[Hip-hop music|hip-hop]] within the state of [[Alaska]], primarily in the metropolitan areas of [[Anchorage, Alaska|Anchorage]] and [[Fairbanks, Alaska|Fairbanks]], and to a lesser extent [[Juneau, Alaska|Juneau]]. Despite its remote location, since the late 1970s, Alaska has had a steady growth in population, including its African American community; some observers describing the state as a melting pot of numerous cultures from across the continental United States.
